content.en: Credit risk assessment: Researchers have explored various questions related to credit scoring and loan default prediction using machine learning algorithms. They have investigated the effectiveness of ensemble models, such as bagging, boosting, and random forests, in improving credit scoring models. Additionally, they have examined the performance of different algorithms, including LightGBM, XGBoost, Logistic Regression, and Random Forest, in predicting loan default risk. These studies highlight the potential of machine learning techniques in accurately assessing credit risk and making informed decisions in the banking and finance industry.
content.da: Kreditrisikovurdering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til kreditvurdering og forudsigelse af misligholdelse af lån ved hjælp af maskinlæringsalgoritmer. De har undersøgt effektiviteten af ensemblemodeller, såsom bagging, boosting og random forests, til at forbedre kreditvurderingsmodeller. Derudover har de evalueret ydeevnen af forskellige algoritmer, herunder LightGBM, XGBoost, Logistisk Regression og Random Forest, i at forudsige risikoen for misligholdelse af lån. Disse studier fremhæver potentialet i maskinlæringsteknikker til nøjagtigt at vurdere kreditrisiko og træffe informerede beslutninger i bank- og finanssektoren.
